titles.title: Honoring Christina Taylor Green for giving the gift of life with organ donation and encouraging Americans to join her call to make organ donation a personal choice.
Honoring Christina Taylor Green for giving the gift of life with organ donation and encouraging Americans to join her call to make organ donation a personal choice.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary:
Honors Christina Taylor Green for giving the gift of life with organ donation.
Encourages Americans to join her call to make organ donation a personal choice.
